name: A Lots Of Packets
description:
You are in charge of creating a network between clients and some external connections.

The game have no sound.

You need to protect your network from bad packets with firewall or clicking on them.
This game was created for the Quarantine Jam.

Link: link the network together
Firewall: protect your network from bad packets(red one)
Server: Generate packet cleaner/booster (yellow one)

Usage: Arrow key to move the map. mouse click to build
